<title level="1" right="Trait">[Troll](/Traits.aspx?ID=241)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

Trolls are giant, brutish creatures and are well known for their ability to regenerate.
